description: Whip up this sumac yoghurt in five minutes. It's perfect as a sauce with fish, meat or veggies. Try it drizzled on salads or dollop it onto soup for a zingy kick.
keywords: Sauce,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Bonus,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Sumac yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a small bowl and serve.
